name: The Ugly Duckling Spin-Off
description:
ONLY WORKS ON FIREFOX (For me at least)

Controls: 

  • Press Spacebar rapidly to spin.
  • WASD to move around while spinning

Credits:

A game by Albert A. Antero (Xionis)
